intent_atoms.description: Stream events must surface MP4RA-driven warnings when version/flags diverge and unknown boxes appear.
Provide a reusable CLI EventConsoleFormatter that prints catalog names, summaries, and validation outcomes for each ParseEvent to prepare downstream inspect tooling.
Unknown box encounters must raise VR-006 research issues while continuing to log through DiagnosticsLogger for catalog refresh workflows.

functional_units.name: EventConsoleFormatter CLI
